questions.question: We use the first conditional in...

choices.answer: situations that happen in the past that affect in the future
situations that happen in the present and affect in the future

questions.question: One example of the first conditional is...

choices.answer: If I always tell the truth, people will trust me.
If I told the truth, people will trust me.

questions.question: We use the second conditional in...

choices.answer: Situations that happen in the present or in the future.

questions.question: One example of the second conditional is...

choices.answer: If I could turn back time, I would tell him not to cheat on the exam.
If I could turn back time, I will tell him not to cheat on the exam.
